name: Gossip Ghosts
description:
Warning

There is a game breaking bug where you can't contain the rumor, so ... the rumor always gets out of control. Sorry about that Jam stuff.

---

A bunch of gossip ghosts are spreading rumors about the town's mayor, Help him keep his town under control!

Controls [WASD] To move [E] Silence (while talking to a ghost)

[Space] Interact/ Proceed with Dialog

Mission Talk to the citizens and figure out who is spreading the gossip around town. Silence the spooks by slapping some red tape on their ghostly gossipy mouths. Just don't silence an innocent chit-chatter talking about something else, but do remember to check back on them because rumors spread fast!

You lose when everyone who has not been silenced is talking about the unwanted rumor.

You win when the rumor has been effectively killed. 


Credits

Gossip Ghosts is a game created by Joven Paul , Gonzalo Ceciliano and Mario Carballo during the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

-Thanks for playing
